'''''O poveste cu un hobbit''''' ["A Story about a Hobbit"] was the first Romanian-language edition of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s ''[[The Hobbit]]'', translated by Catinca Ralea and illustrated by [[Livia Rusz]].
